item.title: Prices mixed at Kochi tea auction
item.description: A mixed trend continues to be witnessed at the Kochi tea auction with prices of certain varieties quoting lower. In sale no 48, the quantity on offer in the Dust CTC grades was 12,98,500 kg. ...

item.title: Pepper falls despite easing of selling pressure
